description:
GN-007 + GNR-101A Archer Arios
This MS configuration is when GN Archer is docked on top of Arios Gundam. It acts as a GN Tail Booster component to Arios to give the Gundam greater speed, firepower, and maneuverability. GN Archer itself is a transformable MS unit, but it can`t transform or combine with Arios in MS form.
name: GN-007+GNR-101A Archer Arios
